artist: After Isaac Oliver; John Sebastian Miller
description: half length portrait of artist facing right and looking at viewer; wearing embroidered doublet with cloak over left shoulder; short curly hair; moustache; ruff; an illustration from Walpole's "Annecdotes of Painting in England" Vol. 1

title: Portrait of Isaac Oliver
